content.raw:
Thank you for pointing this out. The tutorials had drifted out of date with the latest source, which is now set up to use the Catkin build infrastructure.

I just updated the "get the software" tutorial: http://wiki.osrfoundation.org/SandiaHand/Tutorials/GetSoftware

If this fails to build on your machine, please let us know.

Thank you for pointing this out. The tutorials had drifted out of date with the latest source, which is now set up to use the Catkin build infrastructure.

I just updated the "get the software" tutorial: http://wiki.osrfoundation.org/SandiaHand/Tutorials/GetSoftware
